fields.summary: ABFS: [FNSOverBlob] Add Distinct String In User Agent to Get Telemetry for FNS-Blob
fields.description: Add a unique identifier in FNS-Blob user agent to get their usage through telemetry

comments.body:
manika137 opened a new pull request, #7713:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7713

   ## Description of PR
   JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-19575
   Adding a unique identifier in the user agent for FNS-Blob case for telemetry purposes.
   
   ## How was this patch tested?
   Test suite was run- the results of which are added in the comments below

   Test suite was run, results for which is added in the comments below
